thread.title: Frank Lampard enjoys first day of retirement by celebrating wife Christine's birthday
thread.title_full: Frank Lampard enjoys first day of retirement by celebrating wife Christine's birthday

author: James Whaling
title: Frank Lampard enjoys first day of retirement by celebrating wife Christine's birthday
text:
Sport Frank Lampard enjoys first day of retirement by celebrating wife Christine's birthday The 38-year-old called time on his playing career on Thursday after an illustrious career with West Ham, Chelsea, Manchester City and New York City Share Frank Lampard and wife Christine (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Frank Lampard has enjoyed his first day of retirement by celebrating wife Christine's birthday with his two daughters. 
The 38-year-old called time on his playing career on Thursday after an illustrious career with West Ham, Chelsea, Manchester City and New York City. 
Stamford Bridge legend Lampard opted not to sign with a new club in the January window and will now pursue off-field opportunities. 
On his official Instagram page, Lampard shared a snap with Christine and one of his daughters enjoying a meal for his wife's birthday. 
He captioned: "The benefits of retirement! Times with my 3 girls. Happy birthday to my beautiful wife." 
Christine also posted a picture at the restaurant with messages on the table reading: "Super Frank" and "Happy retirement." 
She added: "Thank you for all your birthday wishes and your messages for @franklampard today. Really means a lot! We thought we'd have a celebratory dinner tonight." Video Loading
